categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Operation Venom was a military operation spearheaded by Admiral Bethrogg of the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Behemoth.
The operation's purpose was to find and eliminate the Pegasus Strike Force, which was active in the Mid Rim.
While the operation didn't succeed, it did force the Pegasus Strike Force to disband its forces to keep it from being a bigger target.
